main event: A soldier observed a large dull violet object at Camp Hood, Texas on April 27, 1949.
interesting points: The observer saw a bright white light and the object appeared round,The object traveled west and went on and off at regular intervals during sighting,The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds,Two soldiers were involved in the observation,No other aircraft were in the vicinity at the time.
witness description: Both are enlisted men in the Army.
